set(OPJ_PREFIX itk)
set(ITK3P_INSTALL_EXPORT_NAME "${ITK-OpenJPEG-targets}")
set(ITK3P_INSTALL_INCLUDE_DIR "${ITK-OpenJPEG_INSTALL_INCLUDE_DIR}")
set(ITK3P_INSTALL_RUNTIME_DIR "${ITK-OpenJPEG_INSTALL_RUNTIME_DIR}")
set(ITK3P_INSTALL_LIBRARY_DIR "${ITK-OpenJPEG_INSTALL_LIBRARY_DIR}")
set(ITK3P_INSTALL_ARCHIVE_DIR "${ITK-OpenJPEG_INSTALL_ARCHIVE_DIR}")
add_subdirectory(openjpeg)
itk_module_target(itkopenjpeg NO_INSTALL)
